sections.title: Team member: Glaze
sections.content: Glaze is just a random dude. Feel free to contact him, as long as you bring coffee! :D

sections.title: Team member: Isak
sections.content: Isak converts coffee directly into code. It's scary... <.<

sections.title: Consultant: Lovisa
sections.content: Lovisa always brings a smile, and when she brings coffee she gives smiles. :)
